category: news
title: "How AI Can Supercharge Your Job Search"
excerpt: "Step 1: Develop your resume and online profile. The first step in any job search is to prepare your resume and online profile (on Handshake or LinkedIn) and pull together the core components of your cover letter. These documents should list relevant education and employment history as well as your skills, abilities, and interests."
